short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds an easily-accessible button to your toolbar to enable or disable Privoxy

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Privoxy Button adds an icon to your Chrome toolbar indicating the enabled/disabled status of Privoxy and allowing you to quickly control it.
